title: Machine Learning Concept Comprehension and Scientific Argumentation-Based Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A course for university engineering/science majors, with a completed practical setup using digital devices (e.g., laptops).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ML model performance using a scientific argumentation framework (evidence-reasoning-claim).
According to the cognitive apprenticeship model, learners can emulate expert-level thinking processes during ML model development.
Learners can visually diagnose overfitting/underfitting issues and produce reports combining technical explanations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
